titleStmt.title: James R. Garniss to James W. Tate
CWG2758

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

creation.placeName: San Francisco, San Francisco County, California

body.p:
San Fransisco April 3d 1862
Jas W. Tate Esqr
asst Sec of State
Frankfort Ky.
Dr Sir

Your favor of the 11th Nov last enclosing Commission from the Governor of the state of Kentucky. naming me as a Commissioner of Deeds for said state resident in California, has been received although somewhat delayed owing to the irregularity of the Overland Mail, In compliance with your letter. I herewith enclose the required oath of office -- an Impression of my official seal my signature, and the fee of $5 --
Thanking His Excellency the Governor and yourself for your kindness

I have the honor to be
Very truly
Yours,
James R. Garniss
